text: The best dreams happen when you’re awake.
author: Cherie Gilderbloom

text: Fall seven times and stand up eight
author: Japanese Proverb

text: We do not remember days, we remember moments.
author: Cesare Pavese

text: Our  life  is  what  our  thoughts  make  it.
author: M. Aurelius

text: Don't worry if something doesn't work. If everything worked, you would have been fired.
author: Mosher’s Law of Software Engineering

text: People who think they hate computers actually hate bad programmers.
author: Larry Niven

text: If you give a person a program, you will occupy him for one day. If you teach a person to program, you will occupy him for life.
author: Waseem Latif

text: Sometimes the best programs are created on a piece of paper. Programming them is a secondary thing.
author: Max Kanat-Alexander

text: Programming is the splitting of something big and impossible into something small and quite real.
author: Jazzwant

text: For every complex problem, there is a solution that is quick, simple and wrong.
author: H. L. Mencken
